text: These pizzas are insanely good (read: fresh mozzarella, tangy and slightly sweet tomato sauce, crispy roasted crust that's just thin enough). It's also a plus that it doesn't take too long to wait and eat. Ladies- there are under seat hooks for your bags!

name: Cheryl Jones
text: I totally enjoyed my first visit. I took my Grandson for our Friday date nite and he was equally as impressed. Quick and friendly service. Looking forward to my next visit.

text: Good place for a pizza with tons of toppings. They also have Keto pizza and cauliflower pizza. This is not your typical NYC pizza place so don't expect that kind of flavor and you will enjoy it.

name: Steveo Roy

text: Excellent pizza. The build your own is a steal for eight dollars and some change you can have limited topings. I love the concept of an assembly line making your own pizza is like Subway but for pizza.
